Package org.prolog4j.jlog

This package contains the JLog implementation of the Prolog4J API.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
JLogConversionPolicy JLog implementation of the conversion policy.
JLogProver Represents a Prolog knowledge base and provides methods for solving queries on it.
JLogProverFactory An implementation of IProverFactory which always returns JLogProver instances.
JLogQuery The JLog implementation of the Query class.
JLogSolution<S> The Solution class is responsible for traversing through the solutions of a query.
 

Package org.prolog4j.jlog Description

This package contains the JLog implementation of the Prolog4J API.
